title: Responsive Tourism Website
description: Responsive website with an integrated mobile travel card feature. Head over to notion to view my in-depth case study.

title: Music Player
description: Music player build with Vanilla JavaScript. Shuffle or repeat songs and select song from a playlist.

title: Product Viewer Web App
description: React web app to filter, search and display products dynamically. View all products in a responsive grid, or cycle through them individually with additional information.

title: Exhibition Catalogue
description: Catalogue accompanying the group show 'The New Monumentality' at the Henry Moore Foundation. Softcover, 185 x 245 mm, 52 pages. Archival documents in duotone wrap around the three sections.

title: TfL Art on the Underground
description: Selection of printed matter and display graphics for Art on the Underground, the public art programme on the London Underground, following their brand guidelines.

title: Milton Keynes Gallery
description: Selection of printed matter and layout design for Milton Keynes Gallery.

title: Art Gallery Map
description: Map of London East and West End Galleries, 148 x 210 mm, map/leaflet, 4 pages
